items.sentence: I think it\'s time for me to get my own place.

You don\'t need to tell Tom. He already knows.

Tom told me that he\'d never done that before.
We have to make sure we get this done by 2:30.
Tom and I both didn\'t go to today\'s meeting.

I\'m surprised Tom doesn\'t have a girlfriend.

No matter what happens, I\'ll always love you.
